subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Jimmy Clausen, a top-rated high school quarterback, is scheduled to enroll early at Notre Dame this month. The question that will hover over his career will be whether he is the next Joe Montana or the next Ron Powlus.
snippet: Jimmy Clausen, a top-rated high school quarterback, is scheduled to enroll early at Notre Dame this month. The question that will hover over his career will be whether he is the next Joe Montana or the next Ron Powlus.
